alert.note: Alert for Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 9:18PM CDT until June 17 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM MDT FOR WALLACE COUNTY... At 815 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northwest of Sharon Springs, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported tennis ball sized hail 4 miles east of Weskan at around 8 PM MDT. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe storm will be near... Sharon Springs around 820 PM MDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
